name: (not so) SLY SUMMIT THIEF
description:
There once was a stupid little thief who wanted to rob some money from the magical coin sacks in the mountains. Because we all know mountains have magical coin sacks flying around. He didn't know exactly where they were, though. So he just decided to run around aimlessly. In bright daylight. 

That's right! He didn't even go at night, wich means that all the police are after him! You need to bring him to as many coin sacks as possible before he gets caught!

With the money you collected, you can buy cool upgrades such as:

More Health! Higher Jumps! ... that's it. BUT they're still cool!! 

This game was created during a Game Jam. (In 2 days). It was the very first Game Jam I ever participated in, so I hope it's not COMPETELY terrible!
I might even update it in the future... who knows? ;)

You can find my Youtube channel where I upload all of my DevLogs here:
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYmjXFVfYnwY3tJNEpvvFHQ
